Abilities.Name: Broodmate Swarm
Abilities.Ability: When you place Broodmates Koz Krasz and Krot, place down two marked swazlid swarm tokens.

Abilities.Name: Vision (Broodmate)
Abilities.Ability: When calculating line of site, Broodmates Koz Krasz and Krot can use the line of site of either of it's marked Swazlid Swarm tokens.
